data.actual_result: Instead of showing up as "Bobs-Dj" it doesn't auto full the "-" (ex:"Bobs Dj")
data.expected_result: It should auto fill to be "Bobs-Dj"
data.short_description: Dash does not replace space when editing a text channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a text channel - edit the text channel name with a space in i, "Bobs Dj" - the dash wont auto fill
